product_overview: Pets Almeida is a responsive landing page designed for a pet care service specializing in pet bathing, grooming, and pet taxi services in São Paulo. The landing page communicates services, pricing, payment methods, and contact options with clear calls-to-action to facilitate customer engagement via WhatsApp and phone.
core_goals: Highlight the pet care services and transparent pricing clearly to users.
Enable easy customer conversion through prominent CTAs linking to WhatsApp and phone calls.
Communicate all accepted payment methods, including associated fees, transparently.
Build trust and credibility through an about section and highlighted features.
Deliver a smooth, simple, and responsive user navigation experience across all devices.
key_features: Fixed header with anchor navigation for Home, About, Services, Payments, and Contact sections.
Mobile-friendly hamburger menu that toggles open/close states and updates icons accordingly.
Smooth scrolling navigation with header offset compensation for anchor links.
Prominent 'Agende Agora' CTA directing users directly to the contact section.
Service cards displaying icons, service titles, and detailed pricing tables by pet size and service type.
Payment section listing accepted payment methods (Credit, Debit with fixed fee, Pix, Cash) with notes on debit fees.
Contact section showing clickable phone number, Instagram handle, address, and WhatsApp button with prefilled message.
IntersectionObserver powered fade-in animations on service cards and highlights when they enter the viewport.
Consistent and friendly UI theme with clear typography, responsive grid layout, and light/dark mode support.
SEO essentials including semantic HTML structure, lang attribute, meta descriptions, favicon, and robots.txt.
user_flow_summary: Visitors land on the home page and browse through sections describing services and pricing.
User initiates contact by clicking the 'Agende Agora' button, which scrolls to the contact section.
From the contact section, user can choose to start a WhatsApp conversation with a prefilled message or call the business via phone link.
On mobile devices, users open the hamburger menu to navigate between sections using anchor links.
Smooth scroll enhances navigation, and animated entry of service cards improves engagement.
validation_criteria: Fixed header is always visible on desktop and mobile viewports.
Mobile hamburger menu toggles open and closed with icon and label updating correctly.
Anchor navigation scrolls smoothly with offset that accounts for fixed header height.
'Agende Agora' CTA button scrolls user to the contact section reliably.
Service cards display accurate pricing data consistent with business rules, including Saturday-only Taxi Dog availability and debit payment fees.
Payment section lists exactly four payment methods with clear debit card fee information.
Contact section contains clickable phone and WhatsApp links with prefilled messaging and correct social media information.
IntersectionObserver animations trigger as service cards and highlights scroll into view with fade-in effect.
Page layout is fully responsive with no visual breaks and supports both light and dark modes.
SEO best practices are met including correct lang attribute, semantic HTML, and presence of favicon and robots.txt files.
